Fall 2020 MATH 241 Calculus III

Textbook: Calculus, Early Transcendentals (8th edition), by Stewart, published by Cengage Learning.

Lecture notes: most of the materials in the notes are from the textbook and the notes written by Dr. Justin Wyss-Gallifent.

Exams:
Exam 1: covers chapters 12 and 13.
Exam 2: covers chapter 14 and sections 15.1-15.3.
Exam 3: covers sections 15.4-15.9 and 16.1-16.5.
Final exam: a cumulative final exam with a little bit more focus on the materials after exam 3.
